sourcesContent:
<template>
    <largeNavBar v-if="widthLarge" ></largeNavBar>
    <thinNavBar v-else ></thinNavBar>
</template>
<script>
import thinNavBar from './thin-nav-bar.vue';
import largeNavBar from './large-nav-bar.vue';
export default{
    data(){
        return {
            widthLarge : window.innerWidth >= 600 ? true : false
        }
    },
    mounted(){
        window.addEventListener('resize', ()=>{
            this.widthLarge = window.innerWidth >= 600 ? true : false;
        });
    }
}
</script>
